game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the protagonist discovers that they have inherited a set of memories from an ancient civilization. As they delve deeper into these echoes of eternity, they unravel a conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of time itself.
game.beginning: The game begins with the protagonist experiencing strange visions and hearing whispers from an unknown entity. They soon discover that they possess an ancient artifact that holds the key to unlocking the secrets of their inherited memories.
game.ending: Ultimately, the protagonist must make a choice between preserving the timeline or forging a new path, which will determine the fate of humanity. The game concludes with multiple endings depending on the player's actions throughout the story.
